alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Fresno-Clovis; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Mariposa Madera Foothills; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 24 at 9:52AM PST until February 24 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...The northern portion of the San Joaquin Valley including the Counties of Merced, Madera, Fresno and Kings. Also, for the West Side Mountains and the Foothills of Mariposa and Madera Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
